description: Merge file content in the specified project using Delta merge algorithm based on XDef meta-model from Nop Platform. This sophisticated merge algorithm leverages the XDef meta-model to understand file structure and semantics, enabling intelligent content merging that preserves structural integrity and handles conflicts automatically.

projectName.description: Project name, must be a valid file directory name

text.description: Text content to merge into the file using XDef meta-model based Delta merge algorithm
